20#ifndef _DIR_LIST_H
21#define _DIR_LIST_H
22
23/* Management of the list of directories where PO files are searched.
24 It is an ordered list, without duplicates. The default value of the
25 list consists of the single directory ".". */
26
27
28#ifdef __cplusplus
29extern "C" {
30#endif
31
32
33/* Append a directory to the end of the list of directories. */
34extern void dir_list_append (const char *directory);
35
36/* Return the nth directory, or NULL of n is out of range. */
37extern const char *dir_list_nth (int n);
38
39/* Return the current list of directories, for later use with dir_list_restore.
40 Reset the list to empty. */
41extern void *dir_list_save_reset (void);
42
43/* Restore a previously saved list of directories. */
44extern void dir_list_restore (void *saved_value);
45
46
47#ifdef __cplusplus
48}
49#endif
50
51
52#endif /* _DIR_LIST_H */
53
